name: Where Do Ideas Come From?
description:
"Where Do Ideas Come From?" is a personal essay/journal entry presented as an illustrated, interactive "visual novel". It explores my personal struggles, as a creative person, with feeling creative and coming up with ideas.

"Where Do Ideas Come From?" is a short read, taking about 5 minutes max. It is a personal story, but one I think other creatives can relate to. Please feel free to leave a comment or start a discussion if this resonated with you!

This project was made in the Ren'Py game engine for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story jam.

Please Note: This game is not playable on mobile devices (even though you can get the RenPyWeb player to load it). In the future I plan to implement a mobile version, but for now it's desktop browser only!
